attributes.action: build a park in west croydon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 3 members of led zeppelin own the land of croydon general site . i have sentthe money for the park to be built and obtained planning permission yet there still persists a house building sign. the people of croydon need a space away from the concrete jungle.. my local mp is doing nothing. i need your help. everone ihave seen would like the green space with childs playpark.the council can loan their manpower to help no more flats please it is doubful that they will be filled and the new town less than three quarters of a mile away in thornton heath. i suspect crime or threat. make sure the sign is removed it scares people
